https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null On the day of the big India-Pakistan cricket match, a mischievous boy from the slums is forced to work at his father's tea shop. But when he abandons his post to watch the match, the shop gets looted. He learns that there is more to life than cricket. Dukandar
